newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL -- Philip Morris heads higher.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL -- Philip Morris heads higher.

text.p: Shares in Philip Morris Cos Inc gained 5/8 to 87-1/2 preceding the U.S. market open Friday, reversing a two-session slide that cut the share price from 91-3/4.

Philip Morris and other tobacco issues have been under pressure this week from expectations of stronger cigarette regulation and mounting liability lawsuits, and traders said the stocks may now be oversold.
One trader also note that with the recent declines, the usually high-yielding group is even more attractive on a dividend basis.
